subject: p18224196
History: Year old woman with hx afib, cva, right hemiparesis with ftt, poor cough, poor resp excursion, low sa02. Other than af and cva all findings new. , pls. Eval for pna, chf, mass, atelectasis.
Findings: Sternotomy wires are intact without evidence of dehiscence. The artificial mitral and aortic valves are unchanged without complication. The lungs are hyperinflated but clear. The hila and pulmonary vasculature are normal. No pleural effusions or pneumothorax. Mild cardiomegaly and mediastinal silhouette is unchanged.
